language.subtitle: downloading and installing the openamq software

content.p: OpenAMQ is currently a JPMC confidential project and restricted to use under the terms of the License agreement. By downloading this software you confirm that you understand and accept the terms described here.
The current version is 0.8b1. This is a beta release of the server and clients.

Unpack into a working directory and run configure and then make. The source package includes recent validated versions of the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) and the Berkeley Database (BDB) as used by OpenAMQ.

See: Building and installing OpenAMQ.
See: Running and managing an OpenAMQ server.

Unpack into a final directory, e.g. c:\openamq. The clients subdirectory contains OpenAMQ client tools. The servers subdirectory contains the OpenAMQ server executables and a demonstration configuration.
See: Running and managing an OpenAMQ server.
